faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: We'd love to see everyone dressed up and ready to celebrate with us. Think elegant and festive, but most importantly, be yourself. There is no official dress code or color scheme. If you love bold colors, this is absolutely your moment, we would be thrilled to have a colorful, joyful celebration full of personality.
faq.q2: Can I bring a plus one?
faq.a2: Absolutely. Partners are very welcome and children are welcome too. We just kindly ask that you include everyone attending when you complete your RSVP, so we can plan accordingly.
faq.q3: Will the wedding be indoors or outdoors?
faq.a3: Both. We will watch the weather closely, but prepare to spend time outside.
faq.q4: By when do I need to RSVP?

contacts.title: Questions?
contacts.subtitle: If you have any questions you'd rather not ask us directly, or if you simply prefer an alternative, you're very welcome to reach out to our bridesmaid and best man. They're happy to help and know all the important details.

footer.message: Looking forward to celebrating with you!
